description:
This app is a launcher for PocketMirror Notes.  It allows you to open PocketMirror Notes from outside of PocketMirror.  This app works in conjunction with PocketMirror and requires PocketMirror to be installed.
The screen shots are of PocketMirror Notes.
About PocketMirror Notes:
PocketMirror Notes is included with PocketMirror.   PocketMirror Notes is the premier notes / memo app for webOS. Synchronizing Outlook Notes with PocketMirror Notes gives you an easy way to synchronize notes with Outlook and carry them with you at all times.
PocketMirror Notes features include:
- Enhanced webOS notes application.
- View notes by categories.
- Most recent list.
- Full-text search
- E-mail notes.
- And much, much more.  Install PocketMirror and try it today for free.

Wi-Fi is required to use PocketMirror. No USB support.  PocketMirror is $39.95 to purchase and is a free upgrade to current customers.
